meanings.sent1: The gelatinous dessert wobbled on the plate.
meanings.sent2: The jellyfish had a gelatinous texture as it floated in the water.
meanings.sent3: The gelatinous blob on the sidewalk looked like a jiggly alien.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as gelatinous as a bowl of jelly.
meanings.sent5: The gelatinous mass quivered with each step, like a living pudding.

meanings.sent1: The gelatinous candies sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The cake had a gelatinous layer that added a sweet touch.
meanings.sent3: The gelatinous clouds in the sky seemed almost edible.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as gelatinous as the dessert he was eating.
meanings.sent5: The gelatinous substance oozed out of the container, glistening in the light.
